function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to consider interactions between distinct pathogens in a common host","Impact":"Inadequate clinical care, incorrect assessment of disease burden, erroneous epidemiological projections","Mitigation":"Integration of vector management, consideration of multiple diseases transmission by the same vectors","Technologies":"Integrated vector management approaches, local epidemiological surveillance systems","People":"Infected human cases, communities, district, national health systems","Owner":"Global policy circles, local health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of climate change projections in describing the risk of multiple vector-borne diseases","Impact":"Inaccurate disease patterns, incorrect disease prioritization","Mitigation":"Tuning ecosystem structures to future realities, basing understanding on local epidemiological dynamics","Technologies":"Epidemiological surveillance systems, climate change modeling tools","People":"Researchers, health authorities, global policy makers","Owner":"Research institutions, global health organizations"},{"Description":"Heavy focus on pharmacological interventions and limited attention to environmental management at the community level","Impact":"Inadequate response to disease reporting, potential for increased disease transmission","Mitigation":"Shift towards environmental management, increased focus on community-level disease reporting","Technologies":"Environmental management tools, community-level disease reporting systems","People":"Communities, local health authorities","Owner":"Local health authorities, community organizations"}]}
